p.s: In the given Scenescene Amir is one of the protagonists.
Amir Kapoor is a successful, powerful lawyer at Leibowitz, Bernstein and Harris with an apartment and private life to match.
He is forty years old and married to Emily Kapoor.
He has been brought into a strict muslimMuslim household, but is an apostate, so he rejects his religion.
He changed his last name from Abdullah to Kapoor, to avoid discrimination.
Furthermore he claims that he comes from India and not Pakistan.
Amir works together with Jory at the lawfirm.
Amir seems disappointed and amazed when he finds out that Jory got the promotion.
You have any idea how much of myself I've poured into that place?(ll. 22f.).
The way he reacts proves that he is naive.
Thinking that he could get the promotion, although he has changed his name and lied about his roots, makes him naive.
He avoids the conversation about the affair and just argues about the promotion, till the guests are gone.
I know what I saw, You have any idea...(p. 72, ll. 21f.).
On the one hand this highlights that Amir is very well behaved, not talking about private promblemsproblems in front of friends.
On the other hand, it shows how much he values his career and that his job is more important to him than his private life.
Besides he is at work before anyone else in the morning and is the last one that leaves the office (p. 72, ll. 25ff.).
One can conclude that he has a lot of stamina and is very ambitious.
